title: Use this ikari C Bike Bracket Holder to Carry Your Tenkara Rod (and more) on Your Bicycle
content:
We love supporting cottage industry manufacturers and ikari has been making some really kick ass accessories for you Tenkara anglers out there. These new ikari C Bike Bracket Holders solve a big issue people have with bikefishing: how to carry your Tenkara canister while riding! Now you can drop it in easily under a bottle cage or use it to carry bear spray, a carrot, a summer sausage, etc.

These are made in Brevard, NC to order and retail for $35. See more at ikari.
author: prolly
